content: crocheted flower motif string bag by lisa gwinner why make a plain string bag when you can make one with a pretty motif this bag uses 2 50 gm skeins ~120 yd each of sport weight linen/cotton blend yarn i used knitpicks cotlin to make it but other similar weight yarns will do a size f/5/3 75 hook was also used for a gauge of ~5 double_crochet/inch gauge isn t critical as long as you don t make it so loose as to run out of yarn this bag measures ~22 from top of handles to bottom the motif is a variation on the flower hexagon motif found in the harmony guide to crochet stitch motifs on pg 54 bottom of bag round 1 chain 5 join with slipstitch slip_stitch in first chain to make a loop round 2 ch4 *double_crochet ch1* 11 times slip_stitch in 3rd of ch4 round 3 ch3 2dc in next ch1 space double_crochet in next double_crochet ch2 *skip next ch1 double_crochet in next double_crochet 2dc in next ch1 space double_crochet in next double_crochet ch2* repeat 5 times slip_stitch to 3rd of ch3 round 4 ch3 double_crochet in same place as ch3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet ch2 *2dc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet ch2* repeat 5 times slip_stitch to 3rd of ch3 round 5 ch3 double_crochet in same place as ch3 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet ch2 *2dc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet ch2* repeat 5 times slip_stitch to 3rd of ch3 round 6 ch3 double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet ch3 single_crochet in ch2 space ch3 *double_crochet in next 8 double_crochet ch3 single_crochet in ch2 space ch3* repeat 5 times slip_stitch in 3rd of ch3 round 7 slip_stitch in next double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet leaving last double_crochet unworked *ch3 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 2 times **double_crochet in 2nd double_crochet double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet *ch3 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 2 times** repeat 5 times slip_stitch in 3rd of ch3 round 8 slip_stitch in next double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet leaving last one unworked *ch3 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 3 times **double_crochet in 2nd double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet *ch3 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 3 times** repeat 5 times slip_stitch to 3rd of ch3 round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same loop as ch1 ch5 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet *ch5 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 4 times **ch5 single_crochet in next double_crochet ch5 single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet *ch5 single_crochet in next ch3 space* 4 times** repeat 5 times end with ch2 double_crochet in single_crochet instead of final ch5 body of bag *ch5 single_crochet in next ch5 space* repeat around end with ch2 double_crochet in top of double_crochet of previous round repeat this round 22 times top of bag round 1 ch1 half_double_crochet around
